reuters.title: POP RADIO <POPX> GETS RITE AID <RAD>
reuters.body: POP Radio Corp said it has signed a seven-year agreement to provide Rite Aid Corp with in-store customized disc jocky-hosted radio programs, resulting in an increase of more than 50 pct in the total number of stores POP now has under contract. Value was not disclosed. Reuter 
